value.title: 21 Day Equity Challenge
value.excerpt: The 21-Day Equity Challenge is a powerful opportunity to develop a deeper understanding of how inequity and racism affect our lives and our community.

value.title: 3 Myths About the Concept of Psychological Safety
value.excerpt: Psychological safety is a relatively new concept, especially in the workplace, and there are several myths about what psychological safety is that need to be debunked. value.title: Race is a Social Construct
value.excerpt: Race is a social construct.  It isn’t rooted in science. It isn’t rooted in biology or genetics. It is essentially a fabrication from the sky used to justify hate, greed and world domination.  In Part 1 of "Building a Deeper Understanding of Race & Racism", DEI expert Ritu Bhasin explains the history
